Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by suggesting that Joe Biden was reading a pre-written response from a teleprompter when he said "I lost that line."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a clip of Joe Biden saying "I lost that line" without the full context of the interview.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Joe Biden was reading from a teleprompter without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation provided by Telemundo, which states that the monitor went blank while Biden was answering a viewer's question, prompting him to make the remark.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Telemundo confirmed that Biden was not provided questions ahead of time, nor did he use a teleprompter or read any of his responses during the interview.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by misrepresenting the actual events of the interview and spreading false information.
